actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To provide a 1-year extension of the applicability of the authority to transfer funds under the programs for block grants regarding mental health and substance abuse.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide a one-year extension of the applicability to mental health and substance abuse block grant programs of specified provisions regarding transfers between allotments.

titles.title: To provide a 1-year extension of the applicability of the authority to transfer funds under the programs for block grants regarding mental health and substance abuse.
